external_games.name: Animal Yokochou: Doki-doki Kyuushutsu Daisakusen! no Maki

name: Animal Yokochou: Doki-doki Kyuushutsu Daisakusen! no Maki
summary: Animal Yokochou: Doki-doki Kyuushutsu Daisakusen! no Maki is an Action game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2005.
